title: What were the Monte-Carlo Masters results?
description: Play continued on Saturday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where players advanced to the final in both singles and doubles. Carlos Alcaraz marched into the championship match by edging fellow Spaniard Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. Italian Lorenzo Musetti is into an ATP Masters 1000 final for the first time following his thrilling three-set win against Alex de Minaur. View all of the Saturday Monte-Carlo tennis results below.   Results - Saturday, 12 April 2025 Men's Singles - Semi-finals [2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) 76(2) 64 [13] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [8] Alex de Minaur (AUS) 16 64 76(4) Read more: Musetti edges De Minaur in Monte-Carlo thriller, advances to first Masters 1000 final Read more: Alcaraz moves past Davidovich Fokina, reaches Monte-Carlo final Men's Doubles - Semi-finals [WC] Romain Arneodo (MON)/Manuel Guinard (FRA) d [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN)/Henry Patten (GBR) 64 75 [7] Julian Cash (GBR)/Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) d [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA)/Mate Pavic (CRO) 76(2) 67(5) 10-6   [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Play continued on Friday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where players advanced to the quarter-finals in both singles and doubles. Carlos Alcaraz led the way into the last four. View all of the Friday Monte-Carlo tennis results below.
text: Monte-Carlo View all results from Saturday in Monte-Carlo April 12, 2025 Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters is the first clay-court ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff Play continued on Saturday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where players advanced to the final in both singles and doubles. Carlos Alcaraz marched into the championship match by edging fellow Spaniard Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. Italian Lorenzo Musetti is into an ATP Masters 1000 final for the first time following his thrilling three-set win against Alex de Minaur. View all of the Saturday Monte-Carlo tennis results below. html:
Monte-Carlo

View all results from Saturday in Monte-Carlo

April 12, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters is the first clay-court ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

Play continued on Saturday at the Rolex Monte-Carlo Masters, where players advanced to the final in both singles and doubles. Carlos Alcaraz marched into the championship match by edging fellow Spaniard Alejandro Davidovich Fokina. Italian Lorenzo Musetti is into an ATP Masters 1000 final for the first time following his thrilling three-set win against Alex de Minaur.

View all of the Saturday Monte-Carlo tennis results below.

Results - Saturday, 12 April 2025
Men's Singles - Semi-finals
[2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) 76(2) 64
[13] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [8] Alex de Minaur (AUS) 16 64 76(4)

Read more: Musetti edges De Minaur in Monte-Carlo thriller, advances to first Masters 1000 final

Read more: Alcaraz moves past Davidovich Fokina, reaches Monte-Carlo final

Men's Doubles - Semi-finals
[WC] Romain Arneodo (MON)/Manuel Guinard (FRA) d [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN)/Henry Patten (GBR) 64 75
[7] Julian Cash (GBR)/Lloyd Glasspool (GBR) d [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA)/Mate Pavic (CRO) 76(2) 67(5) 10-6
